allowed_vocab: connecting tubule / collecting duct principal cells

mapping_rules.pattern: non-glomerular endothelial|peritubular capillary|peritubular endothelial|non-glom EC|vasa recta|vascular endothelial
mapping_rules.label: non glomerular endothelial cells

mapping_rules.pattern: proximal tubule|prox tubule|PT S1|PT S2|PT S3|PTS1|PTS2|PTS3|Inj-PT|injured proximal|FR-PT|fatty remodeled PT
mapping_rules.label: proximal tubule cells

mapping_rules.pattern: descending thin limb|DTL|thin descending limb|ascending thin limb|loop of Henle|TAL|thick ascending limb
mapping_rules.label: loop of Henle cells
connecting tubule / collecting duct principal cells

mapping_rules.pattern: intercalated cell|IC A|IC B|ICA\b|ICB\b|alpha intercalated|beta intercalated
mapping_rules.label: collecting duct intercalated cells

mapping_rules.pattern: pericyte|Per-SMC|smooth muscle cell|vascular smooth muscle|mural cell
mapping_rules.label: pericyte / smooth muscle cells
